title: Kyrie
creator_contributor_role: Bendigo Senior Secondary College, production facilities
abstract: A story of deception and jealousy over a girl
description: A short created by a student for the 2004 ACMI Diegesis secondary school media festival. A student called Jack is being framed by another student at his school, who accuses him of stealing his girlfriend.  Jack has his exam papers forged, gets drawn into fights and is generally stalked by the jealous boyfriend. Jack cannot seem to prove his innocence and is blamed for everything by the principal of the school who doesn't believe his stories of persecution....he later finds out why...the girl in question is the school principal's daughter.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006676; Diegesis Festival 2004. Program 3; Active; 2004
